Structs/Plaintext.html#/s:10CryptorECC9P.name: init(string:encoding:)
Structs/Plaintext.html#/s:10CryptorECC9P.abstract: Initialize a Plaintext instance by encoding the provided String.

Structs/Plaintext.html#/s:10CryptorECC9P.name: signUsing(ecPrivateKey:)
Structs/Plaintext.html#/s:10CryptorECC9P.abstract: Sign the plaintext data using the provided ECPrivateKey.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: asn1
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: The r and a values of the signature encoded into an ASN1 sequence.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: init(r:s:)
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Initialise an ECSignature by providing the r and s values.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: init(asn1:)
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Initialize an ECSignature by providing an ASN1 encoded sequence containing the r and s values.

Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: verify(plaintext:using:)
Structs/ECSignature.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Verify the signature using the given public key.

Structs/ECSignature.html.name: ECSignature
Structs/ECSignature.html.abstract: The signature produced by applying Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm

Structs/Plaintext.html.name: Plaintext
Structs/Plaintext.html.abstract: A container for data that will be signed or encrypted.

Classes/ECPublicKey.html#/s:10CryptorECC.name: init(pemKey:)
Classes/ECPublicKey.html#/s:10CryptorECC.abstract: Initialize an ECPublicKey from a .pem file format.

Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.name: init(p8Key:)
Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.abstract: Initialize an ECPrivateKey from a .p8 file format.

Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.name: init(pemKey:)
Classes/ECPrivateKey.html#/s:10CryptorEC.abstract: Initialize an ECPrivateKey from a .pem file format.

Classes/ECPrivateKey.html.name: ECPrivateKey
Classes/ECPrivateKey.html.abstract: A class representing an Elliptic curve private key.

Classes/ECPublicKey.html.name: ECPublicKey
Classes/ECPublicKey.html.abstract: A class representing an elliptic curve public key.
